Es Perfecto

cheio de bug, mas nois gosta
Es un buen juego, pero aun hay demasiados bugs y errores que deben corregir, fuera de eso en mi opinion es un juego muy entretenido
Peculiar, no começo você pode se assustar com alguns assassinos, mas depois é você que quer matar esses poha de tanta raiva que tu passa com essa caceta. Recomendo, em promoção claro.
esse jogo me faz questionar minha sanidade.
hhahahahahah funny man go stabby stab

The game could be good if you were able to play it. Instead, you are matched with people who have been playing for years and lose before being able to learn anything. Their system of matching players is broken and I would recommend playing something else.

真巧!!開場重生在厄咒旁 而且剛好3人都在一台機旁邊耶  嘻嘻!
壓昏鬼囉!!   閃個手電筒製造氣氛~~    我還有下一個板區跟你玩
哎呀 又亮了一台  你動作可能要快一點囉 

製作團隊比起更新玩家社群的意見 
更喜歡在讀取畫面放冷笑話，再掛員工姓名，好用來偽裝公司工作環境很和樂融融，
是吧?

剛購買時 玩人類跟朋友多排到R5，一直都有競技對抗的遊戲體驗，除非太多失誤或是撞紅段鬼。
但開始玩鬼之後，遊戲的各種BUG判定多到我懷疑 根本不是對抗遊戲
更別提官方各種以新手人類玩家為出發點的更新平衡機制

現在我也不管拔線冷卻懲罰了，只要排到普蘭金街 警局跟農場  就是拔爆，不用在那白白受氣，又可以順便卡rank

現在人類配對 不管是多排還是單排都可能等個幾分鐘不等，但鬼玩家任何時段都是秒排秒進
說明了鬼玩家的大量流失已經嚴重影響配對機制，玩家比例嚴重失衡，這就是為甚麼你老是排到rank相差甚遠的敵人，嫌玩家太多的官方最好是有打算添加AI鬼機制。

總結 如果你有朋友一起遊玩，那這會是一款很優秀刺激的對抗遊戲
沒有的話  就他媽別買這破遊戲了
Gutting Dwight with a Chainsaw, for some reason, has not gotten old after 5 years. So yes, this game is recommended for that alone. GG!
Very fun game to play with friends, worth the price.

As much as I want to say the game is bad, the devs are bad, and asymmetrical games in general are flawed and can never be balanced, I've had too much fun playing this to leave a bad review. When my friends and I just started playing it we sucked and were scared and we had a great time. When we started to suck less and stopped getting scared (jump scares excluded) we still had fun but it was a different fun. We also have raged a lot. A horrendous amount, actually. And doing generators may have slightly broke the M1 on my mouse from holding it down so much. But I still have fun. Usually.
PS if you buy this please don't self-care in the corner of the map, unless your goal is to help the killer
прикольный геймплей особенно за духа и трюкача
Хорошая игра. Позитивная. Всегда любил убивать людей. А ещё она без багов ;)
One of the best horror game. Its actually not horror...but its so good to play. Really should try it out!

Every match costs a piece of your sanity until you're left with nothing but regret.
9/10
Игра интересная увлекательная не даёт заскучать рекомендую пока скидка
one of the best games ever
Otimo multiplayer,mas ainda precisa dar uma otimização no game....

SURV:
LCM+SPACE=EZWIN
MANS:
HEX=WIN
BUBBA:
INSIDIOUS+BASEMENT=WIN
P.S отдельный разговор это сообщество в дбд ,а конкретно дбдру в дискорде.
К чехлу для члена,в комплекте идет ее пидорковатый куколд,которые будут ныть,охать,винить пинг,ебать мать мана и тд.
Dumb and fun but not balance, play at your own risk

i LOVE this game, its very fun to play as killer but on survivor side not so much. I mean survivor side is fine but it just gets boring without a friend to play with, and i have no friend so games fun :)

tek kişiyseniz killer olabileceğiniz 2/3/4 kişiyseniz survival oynayıp eğlenebileceğiniz güzel bir oyun
EL mejor juego de terror pVp del momento.

Very Funny with friends !! Very GOOD !! حلوه مره وممتعه مع اخوياك
いつもこれで抜いてます♡
oyun çok iyi ama optimizasyonu orta

Ich habe erst das Spiel nicht spielen wollen aber bin inzwischen süchtig danach. Die ändernden Maps und die vielfältigen Killer machen das Spiel immer wieder spannend und zu einem Genuss. Einzig die Kosten für die DLC  sind einfach krank. Dafür das man nur neue Survs und Killer bekommt (mit zugehörigen Perks) ist der Preis deutlich zu hoch.
很上头。处决太吓人，开黑有意思
i love this game but it makes me want to kill myself sometimes 10/10 would recommend
Love this game. You will love it sometime and hate it sometime. But will always come back to it. Lots of bugs but lots of fun.
A que era de terror, creia que era de magia
your game is relly good it has bin the most fun in the game and it has bin a blast playing as nemisis
游戏根本没人管吧，外挂满天飞，人跑的贼快，一块石头绕你绕死你！不整治迟早黄的游戏！没有手玩什么游戏

Didn't know who the shape was so when he was just staring at me the whole time and not attacking I thought he was friendly. 


He wasn't

РЕКОМЕНДУЮ!
1. Если вы хотите потоксичить то для вас фулл стак генрашеров
1.2.если токсить за мана то за имба манов
2.Игра заставляет материться временами больче чем в доте
3.Если вы не умеете играть, вас зачмырят в первойже катке
4.если вы умеете мансить за мана и за сурва, в вашу сторону полит больше матов чем в мире шуток про мамку
5.Брать за Full price не советую, но на скидках можно, это же касается и DLC
6.Для новичков советую играть со своими знакомыми в custom game и там потренироваться
This game has come a long way since 2016. A tough game with a lot to learn and a toxic community, made up for by unique asymmetrical gameplay
Fun game with a lot of diversity.

Dieses Game wird bei jeden Update immer schlimmer vorallem sind die spielern richtig toxisch und ja das machts making ist mega scheisse du spielst als anfänger gegen 1ser spieler richtig nice da hat man voll fun
This Game Gives Me Depression. But I Still Play it.
It's more fun on the survivors team when your team mates actually work together. It's fun for killers when you find the killer you perform the best with.
Игра прикольная особенно когда играешь Виктором в футбол реально топ

Whatever you do DO NOT TAKE YOUR HANDS OFF THE KEYBOARD/CONTROLLER. The second you go to drink water, check a text, fix your glasses, or anything the game knows. It is instinctively aware of when your hand is away and triggers a skill check. This game finds worst moments to throw a skill check at you so be prepared to drop whatever you're doing to make that skill check.

But ya it's fun

Je viens de faire ma plus belle game en tueur de ma vie, 5 gâteaux d'anniversaire , tout au max pour les points de sang pour au final, lorsque le dernier survivant est entrain de se faire aspirer par l'entité, mon jeu crash.
Je me dis alors ceci "tranquille je relance et j'aurais mes points de sang.".
MAIS NON 
JE NE RECOMMANDE PAS CE JEU QUI M'A SUREMENT FAIT PERDRE 300 000 POINTS DE SANG A CAUSE D'UN CRASH
